hero.title: Nikukyu Cat Cafe
hero.description: Our authentic cafe menu and friendly cats will help you unwind from your daily stress. Feel free to drop by.

cafe.title: About Our Cafe
cafe.description: We offer a wide variety of cafe menu items and light meals. The dining space and cat space are separated so you can relax comfortably.

cats.title: Our Cats
cats.description: We have various cats including kittens and popular long-haired breeds. Some cats love to sit on laps, so feel free to interact with them.

staff.title: About Our Staff
staff.description: Our staff includes certified cat care specialists and skilled cooks. We strive to create a relaxing atmosphere.

catspace.title: Cat Space
catspace.description: You can bring drinks ordered from our cafe. Order a snack set to give treats to the cats.

reception.title: Reception
reception.description: Please check in at the reception. We recommend online reservations for weekends due to high demand.

gourmet.title: Wednesday Gourmet Day
gourmet.description: Every Wednesday, we offer special lunch in our cafe space. Our weekly changing menu is very popular. Please inquire for details.

mai.title: Mai, Owner
mai.description: A cat lover living with three cats at home. Certified cat care specialist.

youko.title: Youko, Cafe & Kitchen Manager
youko.description: Our certified barista and kitchen manager. Hosts monthly coffee & cafe seminars.

daisuke.title: Daisuke, Cat Dad
daisuke.description: A cat lover who enjoys DIY and motorcycles. He crafted most of our cafe's interior.

cta.description: Weekday mornings are usually less crowded. Reservations are recommended for weekends and holidays. Send us your name and contact info, and we'll respond with the latest availability.

footer.copyright: Â© Copyright {year} Nikukyu Cafe All rights reserved.

error.title: Something went wrong!
error.description: An error occurred. Please try again.
